channel.title: Ladder problem[PI]
channel.description: Hello guys. I put a ladder in my server and when i click on it i go up but the animation starts when i'm already at the top. Here's the code. [code] case 1755: c.startAnimation(828); c.getPA().movePlayer(3238, 3458, 0); break;[/code] If anyone out there could help me that would be great. Thanks. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pcws6OSDCVI

Im just guessing and since my thoughts based on delta this might not work
but if you find the object and set it to teleport you you could make it where when you click the ladder itl tele you right to where it should take you i’ve never used a pi so idk how to change that stuff but thats a simple way

EDIT
i just looked at your vid i dont see your problem the ladder takes you up?
exactly to where it should idk wht your problem is be more specific plox

item.title: Ladder problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

I’m underground and i want to go above ground.
I added a video just to show what my problem is.

Read full topic

item.title: Ladder problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

If you’re in a dungeon and need to go aboveground, take away 6400 from the YCoord.

Although

c.getPA().movePlayer(3238, 3458, 0);

minus 6400 from 3458 obviously brings you into negative numbers, so from 0 - 1 = 9999; Try

c.getPA().movePlayer(3238, 6941, 0)

If all else fails, get the actually coords above the ladder by running to it or whatever and then teleport to that. I can see you’re in a difficult region for -6400 to probably work.

Confused, lol?

Edit: I’m actually confused. Do you mean you are currentely aboveground and want to down to a dungeon? If so, simply add +6400 to the YCoord to get the direct underground coordinate.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Nah, that didn’t work it just brought me in the air.
The ladder is in the dungeon.
So, I want to go on the ground floor.

I put a ladder in my server and when i click on it i go up but the animation starts when i’m already at the top.
Here’s the code.

case 1755: c.startAnimation(828); c.getPA().movePlayer(3238, 3458, 0); break;
If anyone out there could help me that would be great.
Thanks.[/quote]

try (3238, 3458, 1);
